name: Space Defenders
description:
The last remaining two sides of the world come face to face in an attempt to get the universe all for them. Old wizards face the extremely advanced technology that the robots possess. After years of silence, it's finally time for the big battle!Fight for the universe!Be it an old powerful wizard or a high-tech robot, they all want to rule the universe! Engage in the epic battle between the two remaining sides of the world with unique strategies and teamwork.Your QuestWizards must fortify their crystal so they can successfully complete the ritual. On the other side, the cyborgs must plan their attacks accordingly so they can penetrate the magic structures of the wizards.Key Features
  • Shop and economy system where you can get power-ups and various different items to help you form strategies and win the battle
  • The environment sporting contrast between the two very different worlds, each team having a piece of their own world to represent them
  • Stylized art style to fit the game style
The gameplayThe match consists of 3vs3 players: 3 Wizards fighting against 3 Cyborgs. As a wizard, you get dropped onto your island from where you buy some turrets or go straight to fortify the crystal.
If you're a robot, you rush to the panels, build your rockets and shoot them at the wizard's crystal!
